QuestData.Title: Charging The Blade
QuestData.Description:
We can't advance with those juggernauts bombarding our position! I led a strike against the nearest one, but conventional weapons do nothing against their imbued hides.
Thankfully, I have an idea.
Your runeblade can't deal with them as it stands, but if you could purge Gharmal's empowered masses and absorb their essence into the blade...
QuestData.LogDescription: Charge your runeblade by killing enemy constructs in the Stitchyard.
QuestData.RewardText: This may not work... but it may also be our only chance at victory.
